TopicTitle: can you see minmus in the start menu?

Articles.Content:
In the start menu, you can see the Mun. But is it possible to see Minmus? (even if it is just a few pixels and you need to wait a while before it shows up)

Edited September 15, 2020 by minerbat
Well, yes but i'm pretty sure that it would be a bit of a pain trying to spot it, it would be like some 1/10 pixels wide. But that can be fixed if you use Distant Object Enhancements™.
